column1: # Lines with # are skipped by EUTelescope Processors
#  The last 4-6 digits of a lcio run file
#  For Alibava runs is this is either ped or dat. First telescope run to be concatenated with others gets c
column2: the added ones d as extension.

column1: #  The 6 digit (!) pedestal run number that will be used for reco.
#  The good channels of a sensor
#  The gear file to be used for this run.
#  The polarity of the sensor. -1 for p-bulk
#  The event limit up to which clusters will be read from the telescope file in reconstruction. This needs to be set < telescope event count to prevent segfaults.
#  The unsensitive strip sensor axis. This should also be reflected in the gear file used.
#  Option to skip filtering in the 2nd step
#  Include reference plane. Should also be in the gear file.
# An empty/not needed field can be skipped by a comma
